name: Chip
description: Compact tag-style button with optional leading/trailing widgets.

use: you want a small clickable label with optional icons.
avoid: the label needs full button prominence.

patterns.title: Leading and trailing
patterns.code:
Chip(
  leading: const Icon(Icons.label),
  trailing: const Icon(Icons.close),
  child: const Text('Editable'),
  onPressed: () {},
)

theming: Uses `Button` styles for consistency with other controls.
accessibility: Ensure the chip is large enough for touch targets when interactive.
do: Use `style` to match chip variants to context.
dont: Use chips for long text content.
